text: ( Source : State of Michigan ) FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE CONTACT: Chris Gautz, Public Information Officer 517-373-6391 The Michigan Parole Board will hold a public hearing on Thursday, October 29 , 2015 to consider the possible parole of Jerome
